snippet.title: Paper Bride2 Zangling Village Release on April 28
snippet.description:
Some will even interpret the very dream they are dreaming, and only when they awake do they know it was a dream. 
The dream, the dream again, the same nightmare that has been haunting me since I was a child, I always dream that there is someone who is a bride in a paper dress tied to an old tree in Zangling Village…
To resolve this nightmare, I could only return to the place in my dream - Zangling Village.
PAPER BRIDE2 ZANGLING VILLAGE is a Chinese Horror Puzzle Game, the Remastered Version will be available worldwide on April 28th on Steam. 
Exclusive achievements, collectible art sets, and original sound DLC will be available at the same time. Want to uncover the secret of Zangling village? Join into your wish list!
-------------------------------------
Sidescrolling & Remastered — New reworked scenes and characters, not just picturesque!
Collections & Settings — Special offer of the special propaganda original picture for Steam version, rare setting information initial public!
Music Soundtrack — Destiny's Lament,  "This Life and the Next"multi-version and accompaniment in it
-------------------------------------
Go to STEAM to join in your WISH LIST https://store.steampowered.com/app/1879380/2/

Mobile version appointment open!
Google Playstore appointment：https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.funnygames.zjy2hw
App Store appointment：https://apps.apple.com/app/id1614398305
-------------------------------------
